title: #12: Big Bear Pow Day
description: It’s been an insane snow year in SoCal, the kind of season you may only see every ten years. At Bear Mountain, it’s almost been more about riding powder in the canyons than shredding one of the best parks in the world. In this Video Of The Week, Arbor marketing director, Brad Farmer and Bear Mountain team rider, Eli Weiner set out on a powder mission into Bow Canyon–Eli on the Wasteland snowboard and Brad on the Draft. Not your typical pow boards but then this isn’t your typical place to shred deep snow. Get into it.
tags: arbor,Arbor Snowboards,Bear Mountain,Bow Canyon,Brad Farmer,Draft,Eli Weiner,Wasteland
